segments.text: From where I'm standing, the kitchen looks busy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is meticulously drying that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron is tied neatly around her dress.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbelievably, the faucet is on and overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is streaming down the cabinets now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a sloppy mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously balanced on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling out cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl has her hand out, eager for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're cooperating in this little theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window lets in light from the tidy garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It contrasts so much with the indoor hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing the water damage building up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor cabinets are getting soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR
